item.title: CVE-2022-42880|2024-08-03T13:19:05.256Z -- ali%20irani -- auto%20upload%20images
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Ali Irani Auto Upload Images plugin <= 3.3 versions allows Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
